features: Create adatabaseof your mentees. Keep track of their personal and professional details, goals, objectives, jobs and industries they work in.; Access a variety of pre-populatedresourcesto help you kick-start mentorship in the most effective way.; Organize yourcalendar(supports Zapier, Google Calendar, etc.) and yourto-dolist with ease.; Most importantly,keep track of all your sessions: deliverables, goals, notes, and a lot more all in one (very organized!) place.
